summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 13.0°C) and outside temperature (down 10.2°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles) and cloud levels (up 411 m) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; prepare for cold, chilly weather ahead. Also, the atmosphere will feel parched and dry and slight breezes. Drizzle or light rain possible, overcast skies with low cloud, and it’s dim outside. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
